SELECT sm.studyboardno, sm.studystart, sm.studyend, sm.studyperiod, sm.leaderId, sm.booktitle, sm.studystatus, smm.no, smm.memberId, smm.role, sb.title, b.categoryName, CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE < sm.studystart THEN 0 WHEN CURRENT_DATE > sm.studyend THEN 100 ELSE (DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, sm.studystart) / DATEDIFF(sm.studyend, sm.studystart)) * 100 END AS progress, CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE = sm.studystart THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_today FROM studymanagement sm JOIN studymember smm ON sm.studyboardno = smm.studyboardno JOIN studyboard sb ON sm.studyboardno = sb.no JOIN book b ON sm.booktitle = b.title WHERE smm.memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY
sm.studystart ASC
progress DESC, is_today DESC, sm.studystart ASC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
